entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Cannot consume scoped servicefrom singleton #27326
  • EF bundle seems to not be properly passing --connection parameter #27325
  • EF Core migration's SQL script for computed column expression differs depending on the way the column is being handled #27323
  • Construct IDesignTimeDbContextFactory without first discovering all DbContext types #27322
  • Copy data across tables in bulk (INSERT ... SELECT) #27320
  • Bundle-Migration "failed to restore project" or "it was not possible to find any compatible framework version" #27317
  • When using temporal tables - property named PeriodEnd or PeriodStart has to be DateTime #27316
  • EF Core adds an Id column for foreign key relation although foreign key is provided explicitely #27315
  • Scaffold-DbContext runs successfully but does not create any models #27314

Closed

  • Update to Ubuntu1804 for docker based testing #27220
    7.0.0
  • EF Core 6, Invalid Generated SQL (JOIN Statement) (Big wrong result) #27312
  • Avoid automatic convert nested queries to joins #27267

PullRequests

Created

  • Bump Humanizer.Core from 2.13.14 to 2.14.1 #27321
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:

Merged

  • Update azure-pipelines.yml #27324
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge
